pkgmetadata.longdescription: Log Fold Change Distribution Tools for Working with Ratios of Counts // Ratios of count data such as obtained from RNA-seq are modelled using Bayesian statistics to derive posteriors for effects sizes. This approach is described in Erhard Zimmer (2015) doi:10.1093/nar/gkv696 and Erhard (2018) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/bty471.
